## ExtensibleComponentBoundary() function

Wrapper that adds an extension point context to subcomponent tree.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ExtensibleComponentBoundary: ({ extensionPoints, children, }: ExtensibleComponentProps) => React.JSX.Element
```
